\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{z-eves}   % oz or z-eves or fuzz styles
\newenvironment{machine}[1]{
    \begin{tabular}{@{\qquad}l}\textbf{\kern-1em machine}\ #1\\ }{
    \\ \textbf{\kern-1em end} \end{tabular} }


\begin{document}


\begin{schema}{TClass}
   abc: \seq \nat
\where
   abc =  \langle \rangle

\end{schema}




\end{document}
